column1: doris jean moore| doris jean moore
column9: in the st. marys health center
column10: jefferson city. she was born on june 10
column13: a daughter of arthur and mary ameilia (schwering) brucks
column14: and was preceded in death by her parents and two brothers
column15: arthur and donald brucks. mrs. moore was a member of the st. peters catholic church
column17: and had attended mass daily as long as her health permitted. she enjoyed caring for her home
column20: and reading. mrs. moore retired from the missouri department of revenue after 50 years of service. survivors: her daughter
column27: california; 4 grandchildren; and 5 great-grandchildren. visitation will be held in the holy family catholic church in freeburg from 9:00 a. m. until 10:00 a. m. on wednesday
column30: and the mass of christian burial following at 10:00 a. m. with the rev. nicholas j. reid as the celebrant. interment will be in the resurrection cemetery
column32: under the direction of the vienna chapel of the birmingham-martin funeral homes. memorials are suggested to the holy family school. online condolences may be left at www. birminghammartinfuneralhomes. com
